long_description: Injinji RUN 2.0 Midweight No-Show socks are designed for running but ready for anything. These socks offer a high-density padded interface with maximum cushioning. Injinji RUN 2.0 Midweight socks feature padded heel and metatarsal support, ensuring a high level of comfort and support for the most demanding workouts. Anatomic 5-toe design properly aligns toes, prevents blisters and promotes proper posture and balance. Features padded heels and offers metatarsal arch support. Mesh tops provide maximum ventilation and breathability; stretchy top bands hold socks in place. CoolMax(R) fabric blend wicks moisture, dries quickly and breathes well, allowing you to enjoy the benefits of cool, dry. Heels and toes are reinforced for increased durability. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Injinji RUN 2.0 Midweight No-Show socks are designed for running but ready for anything. These socks offer a high-density padded interface with maximum cushioning.
